dmca.title: Website Cooks up a DMCA Storm
dmca.body:
Crooked Brook
From:	"Crooked Brook" <info@crookedbrook.com>
To:	<Google>
Sent:	Thursday, March 17, 2005 10:48 AM
Subject: Digital Millennium Copyright Act; Recipie Forum
Google, Inc.
Attn: [Recipient]
[Address]
Mountain View, CA 94043
[Phone]
Attn: [Recipient]
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the website www.crookedbrook.com
The material that is infringing the copyrighted work listed above:
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.recipieforum.com/04 tue_oct/food/623457_chef.html
Owner/administrator of the web pages that allegedly contains infringing material:
http://www.whois.sc/recipieforum.com
Registrant Contact:
Recipie Forum
[Private] [e-mail]
[Phone]
Fax: none
[Address]
Brandon, MB R7A5y5
CA


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that
the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[Sender]
[e-mail]
[Address]
Utica, New York 13501
[Phone]
[Fax]
www.crookedbrook.com
